original_text:
On you was I cast from my birth,
    and from my mother's womb you have been my God.
korean_text: 내가 날 때부터 주께 맡긴 바 되었고 모태에서 나올 때부터 주는 나의 하나님이 되셨나이다

sentences.original_text: On you was I cast from my birth
and from my mother's womb you have been my God.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 어미의 태에서부터 당신은 나의 하나님이셨습니다.
